abstract: UBS said on Wednesday that it had hired Michael Ruppert, a defense industry banker.
snippet: UBS said on Wednesday that it had hired Michael Ruppert, a defense industry banker.
lead_paragraph: UBS said on Wednesday that it had hired Michael Ruppert, a defense industry banker. Mr. Ruppert, who had worked at Lockheed Martin and Lehman Brothers, joins UBS from Lazard, where he worked in its Washington office. He will be based in New York and report to Karl Knapp.
